about_the_game:
Embrace Rockford's roots and celebrate 40 years of the iconic game Boulder Dash.


Join us in this unforgettable tribute to the original game. Developed in collaboration with the original creators, this true-to-form Boulder Dash game engine is a must-play for diehard fans and true game connoisseurs.

Relive iconic moments from the past and experience the legendary puzzle game like never before. Don't let time stand in your way – come back in time with us and relive those unforgettable moments today!

The original game concept where the player has to find and collect a certain number of diamonds in a given time. Not only opponents, flowing amoebas, but also falling boulders will try to prevent you from doing so. Successfully completing a level requires both a well-thought-out solution and the right timing, which, combined with the original engine, makes for a timeless puzzle game.

While providing classic Boulder Dash® core gameplay mechanics, Boulder Dash® 40th Anniversary features include:[/h2]

  • 180 all-new levels with advanced features!
  • Includes all levels from the original Boulder Dash I,II and III versions
  • 5 exciting, brand spanking new worlds with high-end graphics
  • new special opponents
  • The Liepa World, a premium world by videogame legend Peter Liepa who returned to the game he created 35 years ago with 20 of the most mind-bending levels yet!
  • Full character customization of your game character Rockford™, e.g. shirt, pants, shoes, eyewear, headgear, hair, and facial hair
  • Languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Russian! More to come soon

THE retro game and legendary action puzzler for players young and more experienced alike arrived, combining up-to date-graphics with original game features – spanning 40+ years of Rockford™ and his friends, digging though caves to collect gems - Boulder Dash® Deluxe!

Created by two Canadian programmers in 1984, Boulder Dash has become one of the longest running videogame franchises! The original Boulder Dash® is a pioneering interactive game dating back to the early times of the home computer and video game era. Its many sequels have delighted and challenged casual and hard-core players of all ages and sexes for over nearly four decades.

Boulder Dash® is a trademark of BBG Entertainment GmbH, registered in the US, the European Union and other countries. Boulder Dash® Deluxe™, the names and likenesses of Rockford™, Crystal™ and Goldford™ are trademarks of BBG Entertainment GmbH. Boulder Dash® Deluxe™ Copyright © 1984-2021 BBG Entertainment GmbH. All rights reserved. The original Boulder Dash® was created by Peter Liepa with Chris Gray.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 11 or higher
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Sound Card: Not Required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 13
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Sound Card: Any

name: BOULDER DASH 40th Anniversary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c-compatible graphics card with 256 MB VRAM and PixelShader 3.0 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT1030 or higher; AMD Radeon RX 460 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
